thread.title: Beavers, Ducks reveal 'Unified for UCC' football helmets
thread.title_full: Beavers, Ducks reveal 'Unified for UCC' football helmets - KPTV - FOX 12

author: FOX 12 Staff
title: Beavers, Ducks reveal 'Unified for UCC' football helmets
text:
PORTLAND, OR (KPTV) - The Oregon State Beavers and Oregon Ducks football teams will honor the victims of the deadly mass shooting at Umpqua Community College.
The two schools, at the same time on Twitter on Friday, unveiled helmets featuring a ribbon and "UCC" on the back.
The caption said, "Unified for UCC."
Unified for UCC. pic.twitter.com/GttYCwSVNB 
— Oregon Football (@WinTheDay) October 2, 2015 Unified for UCC pic.twitter.com/fcEQD6dKYL 
— Beaver Athletics (@beaverathletics) October 2, 2015 The Ducks travel to Colorado to face the Buffaloes on Saturday, while the Beavers have a bye week before traveling to Arizona the following weekend.
Copyright 2015 KPTV-KPDX Broadcasting Corporation.
